## ClassMembersMap.convertAccessorsToProperty() method

Convert get and/or set accessors to a property. This may be lossy, but we try to be faithful.

**Signature:**

```typescript
convertAccessorsToProperty(isStatic: boolean, name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

isStatic


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

true if the property is static (and the accessors should be)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the property name


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
